WorkItem.Description:
I play on a french server and the professions I have appear in french in the XML. When I paste that in rawr, I get an error about an invalid profession because it doesn't recognize the french translation.
 
Addon v 0.42
Rawr Silverlight v4.0.14.0b
 
In case it helps, here is the error in Rawr Silverlight.
 
== Error Message ==
There is an error in XML document (1, 1266).
Instance validation error: 'Calligraphie' is not a valid value for Profession.
 
== StackTrace ==
   à System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(XmlReader xmlReader, String encodingStyle, Object events)
   à System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(TextReader textReader)
   à Rawr.Character.LoadFromXml(String xml)
WorkItem.Summary: [Addon] Professions are not in english in the XML

Comments.Message:
Hmm it appears that the API does not return an English language version of the profession name. Nor does it return a profession ID that would be unique. 

It does however return a profession icon so that SHOULD be unique I could try using that.
